title: TREFF
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Ovo, Macrobiotic, Organic, Raw, Mediterranean, Juice bar, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Spanish
description: Vegetarian bio restaurant offering a menu with 70+ dishes that include raw, vegan, vegetarian, and gluten intolerance food. Uses fresh, organic produce. Collaborates with the Foundation GIOR, an holistic foundation that promotes ecology and sustainability in Mallorca.
